page.title: 06MAYFEST 1985
page.content: {Mayfest}is an annual celebration of dance, music and drama. This was its third year and it took place from 6th to 18th May. Many of the performances were carried out by both children and adults with no previous experience.The { "Steps Out"}Scottish Ballet team of five dancers and one musician worked with sixty people from our local area to produce a performance called "The Garthamlock Award Ceremony". Those taking part ranged from 5 years to 30 years old, and included children from six of the local schools. After four rehearsals the final show was performed in Garthamlock Community Centre. Each group of dancers "nominated" a film, dancing to the music from it. The primary group won with their{"Ghostbusters"} dance while other nominations included "East Side Story" and "Killer Thriller".
